# Load data and clean

```{r}
pantheria <- datatoolboxexos::data_pantheria() %>%
  datatoolboxexos::tidy_pantheria()%>%
  print(n=Inf)

```

# Data exploration

```{r}
pantheria %>% dplyr::count(MSW05_Family)
pantheria %>% dplyr::count(MSW05_Order)

pantheria%>%dplyr::filter(!is.na(Homerange_indiv_km2))%>%dplyr::group_by(MSW05_Family)%>%dplyr::summarise(m = mean(Homerange_indiv_km2), sd = sd(Homerange_indiv_km2),n = dplyr::n())

```
